entry.title: Women’s ZinTex Mid Rise Leggings - Taffy
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 60.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Mid-Rise Fit
● 4-inch Waistband
● Squat Proof/No-Show
● Full-Length
● + ZinTex Technology

ZinTex’s Mid Rise Leggings are full coverage and squat-proof, perfect for heading to yoga or lifting heavyweights. Designed with UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to antimicrobial ZinTex technology. The fabric blend maintains a buttery soft, cool-to-the-touch, near-weightless finish on the skin. Find heat-sealed reflective logos and “Make the Most of Every Minute” on the back of the waistband. Complete the look with a matching top and hoodie.

Materials: 79% Polyester, 21% Spandex

Model Height: 5'7" Size: Small

entry.title: Women’s ZinTex Long Sleeve Crop Sports Top - Taffy
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 36.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Ultra Crop Top
● Light Support
● Raglan Long Sleeves
● Crew Neck
● Athletic Mesh Back Panel
● Heat-sealed Reflective Logos
● + ZinTex Technology

Look and feel your best in the gym wearing ZinTex’s Long Sleeve Crop Sports Top. Made for active performance with UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to antimicrobial ZinTex fabric technology. The raglan sleeve cut gives you additional mobility as you work out and the fabric is cool-to-the-touch. You’ll find a vertical athletic mesh back panel and heat-sealed reflective logo design. Pair with your favorite bottoms or be “that girl” with the complete color-coordinated set.

Materials: 79% Polyester, 21% Spandex

Model Height: 5'7" Size: Small

entry.title: Women’s ZinTex Cropped Workout Hoodie - Taffy
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 52.00

● Made in Los Angeles
● Ultra Crop Length
● Vintage Wash
● Snap Button Hood
● Fitted Waistband & Cuffs
● Heat-Sealed Reflective Logos
● + ZinTex Technology

A warm-up essential: the ZinTex Cropped Workout Hoodie is cut above the waist to contour your shape. Featuring UV 50+, sweat and odor-proof protection exclusive to antimicrobial ZinTex fabric technology. Perfect for a chilly morning run, this sweatshirt comes in a cozy vintage wash with heavy-duty snap buttons on the hood. Find heat-sealed reflective logos and “Make the Most of Every Minute” on the hood. Available in a complete 3-piece matching set.

Materials:
Body: 100% Cotton
Cuff: 93% Cotton, 7% Spandex

Model Height: 5'7" Size: Small

entry.title: Women’s ZinTex Racerback Tank (Berry)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 30.00

  • Antimicrobial Zinc Oxide
  • Form Fitting Cut
  • 4-Way Ultra Stretch
  • Racerback Key Hole
  • Sweat-Wicking
  • Odor-Repellent

Super stretchy & silky soft, the ZinTex Racerback Tank is the sleek addition to your activewear fits. The lightweight, breathable design features a full-length, keyhole racerback cut and reflective logo print. Stay fresh no matter the workout intensity with an odor-blocking and sanitizing Zinc Oxide fabric treatment with added UV protection. Get ready to look and feel in tip-top shape!

Materials: 88% Polyester + 12% Spandex

Model Height: 5'2" Size: Small

entry.title: Women’s ZinTex Eco High-Waist 4" Running Shorts (Berry)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Activewear
Price: 45.00

  • Antimicrobial Zinc Oxide
  • High-Rise Fit 
  • Side Pockets
  • Lightweight Lining 
  • Sweat-Wicking
  • Odor-Repellent

Get ready to take on high-impact workouts in the Zintex High-Rise Eco Running Shorts. Flexible and supportive, these high-rise shorts feature a comfortable outer layer, two pockets and a skin-tight internal lining. The Zinc Oxide antimicrobial fabric treatment sanitizes, provides UV protection against harmful sun rays and blocks odor-causing microbes, keeping you fresh all workout long. Sustainably made using recycled plain weave fabric—all in a silky smooth, breathable design with a reflective logo print.

 

Materials:

Outer: 86% Recycled Polyester + 14% Spandex

Lining: 88% Recycled Polyester + 12% Spandex

Model Height: 5'2" Size: Extra-Small

Show up to yoga class or any low-impact workout in the ZinTex Training Shorts. Snug and flattering, these low-rise shorts feature a brief lining for added support and comfort. The Zinc Oxide antimicrobial fabric treatment sanitizes, provides UV protection against harmful sun rays and blocks odor-causing microbes, keeping you fresh all workout long. Stick your keys or hold onto your cards in the perfectly sized zipper back pocket. Sustainably made using recycled plain weave fabric—all in a silky smooth, breathable design with a reflective logo print.

entry.title: ZinTex Antimicrobial Reusable 3-Ply Sports Mask (Pink)
entry.summary:
Vendor: NonZero Gravity
Type: Face Mask
Price: 9.00

Features:

  • 3-Ply Fabric
  • Zinc Oxide Protection
  • Droplet Infection Proof
  • 3M Water Repellent
  • Cooling Technology

The ZinTex Antimicrobial Sports Mask is constructed using Zinc Oxide treated fabrics, one of the safest and effective antimicrobial treatments on the market. Shield your face from exterior elements with the two water repellent outer layers made of 100% Polyester. Featuring a cool effect technology which prevents overheating during heavy workouts. The honeycomb interior design is printed using antibacterial paint. Train at ease with the breathable design, pliable nose guard and adjustable straps.

Materials: 100% Polyester exterior & middle layer, 100% Nylon lining.

Care: Machine wash in cold water and air dry.
